name: TP-LINK Technologies TL-WN823N IEEE 802.11n USB - Wi-Fi Adapter

reviews.name: TP-LINK TL-WN823N N300 Mini Wireless USB Adapter
reviews.reviewText: Good inexpensive 300MPS adapter, connected it to downstairs computer with my wireless router upstairs, 5 bar connection, and works great! It is very small, smaller than a flash drive and doesn't take up space.
reviews.title: Works Good

reviews.name: TP-LINK TL-WN823N N300 Mini Wireless USB Adapter
reviews.reviewText: The TP Link 300Mbps Mini Wireless N USB worked perfectly. I had an old computer I had in storage still running XP that did not have a network card and I wanted to do an upgrade for it. So I purchased the TP link and had no problems setting it up. It was very easy. I would suggest though that you follow the very simple instructions that come with it. I followed them to the letter and it only took a few minutes before I was connected to a wifi at my local library. I spent a couple of days doing all the updates I wanted to and had NO problems with the device. It's a great product for $16.41 at Walmart. I did a site to store pick-up and it arrived a day earlier then scheduled, which was also a very nice surprise.
reviews.title: Works Great!

reviews.name: TP-LINK TL-WN823N N300 Mini Wireless USB Adapter
reviews.reviewText: This adapter was very easy to install. I like that it's small so it doesn't stick out from the computer a lot. I used it on a second-hand desktop PC that I purchased from a business. The PC had only used Ethernet Internet before. This adapter was a simple, quick solution for changing it over to the Wi-Fi in my home.
reviews.title: USB Adapter

reviews.name: TP-LINK TL-WN823N N300 Mini Wireless USB Adapter
reviews.reviewText: A really easy to use product. Directions were great. My upstairs computer is online; without running yards of crazy expensive cable all over the place. And even though I got the last one in stock in tis model; new model is $4 bucks cjeaper. Most items of this type were running about $60 so I saved a ton. And per the caption it functions as a range extender/virtual hotspot. It the first product to keep its promise in a long time. I can't say enough about how happy I am.
reviews.title: TP-LINK

reviews.name: TP-LINK TL-WN823N N300 Mini Wireless USB Adapter
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Product, Great 300bps. Easy to install Strong Signals, Everyone should have at least one.
reviews.title: Very Good Product!
